GOD.content: dissemination as “that which doesn’t come back to the father,” Abrahamic Renunciation (expecting neither response nor return)
GOD.linkedContent: dissemination as “that which doesn’t come back to the father,” Abrahamic Renunciation (expecting neither response nor return)

GT.content: what is the consensus on the basis of which an implicit linguistic contract permits us to understand one another, to credit each other when we speak of gift? what if we renounced this question for a play without postulate/prescription, a certain concept of dissemination?
GT.linkedContent: what is the consensus on the basis of which an implicit linguistic contract permits us to understand one another, to credit each other when we speak of gift? what if we renounced this question for a play without postulate/prescription, a certain concept of dissemination?

R.content: how can we reconcile the turning unity, autos = ipse, the One, the homogeneity of democracy with its heterogeneity, dissymmetry, disseminating multiplicity
R.linkedContent: how can we reconcile the turning unity, autos = ipse, the One, the homogeneity of democracy with its heterogeneity, dissymmetry, disseminating multiplicity

MONL.content: dissemination, form of thinking of the unique, not the plural
MONL.linkedContent: dissemination, form of thinking of the unique, not the plural

H.content: p. anne 148 disseminating logic of death: because it can be manipulated by everyone, easily?
H.linkedContent: p. anne 148 disseminating logic of death: because it can be manipulated by everyone, easily?

AF.content: spectral motif of archive stages disseminating fission, from which the archontic principle and concept of archive suffers
AF.linkedContent: spectral motif of archive stages disseminating fission, from which the archontic principle and concept of archive suffers

LOBL.content: the suspensive arrêt arrests the decisive arrêt and vice versa, the arrêt de mort arrests the arrêt de mort, arrhythmic pulsation of title [Blanchot’s] before it scatters like sand, in stopping (s’arrêtant) (as arrêt), it gives movement, sets in motion [prime mover]
LOBL.linkedContent: the suspensive arrêt arrests the decisive arrêt and vice versa, the arrêt de mort arrests the arrêt de mort, arrhythmic pulsation of title [Blanchot’s] before it scatters like sand, in stopping (s’arrêtant) (as arrêt), it gives movement, sets in motion [prime mover]

LOBL.content: death sentence, instant as elusive as last grain of sand in hourglass, death as result of dissemination of rhythm of life w/ no coup d’arrêt, unbordered/unbounded arrhythmy on beach that’s continuation of a sea: her pulse “scattered like sand”
LOBL.linkedContent: death sentence, instant as elusive as last grain of sand in hourglass, death as result of dissemination of rhythm of life w/ no coup d’arrêt, unbordered/unbounded arrhythmy on beach that’s continuation of a sea: her pulse “scattered like sand”

LOBL.content: think exteriority from angle of economy of the arrêt: greatest “bound” energy, bandée, tightly gathered around its own limit (Hemmung, Haltung) > immediately disseminated, sand, empty, unloaded, spontaneously: in trance of trans, ghosts, transes, folies du jour (cf. Glas on trépas, trans/partition [Derrida’s referring to Genet crossing national borderlines])

Glas on trépas, trans/partition [Derrida’s referring to Genet crossing national borderlines])

SPOM.content: who’s head of the head (l’archi-specter, le fantôme capital) when ghosts are disseminated everywhere? qui mettre en tête parmi tous ceux qu’on se met en tête?
SPOM.linkedContent: who’s head of the head (l’archi-specter, le fantôme capital) when ghosts are disseminated everywhere? qui mettre en tête parmi tous ceux qu’on se met en tête?

BL.content: hymen of the law, its entry (Eintritt): ante portes (place of premature ejaculation), place & non-place: the adjournment ’til death of child is either premature ejaculation or non-ejaculation: no ejaculate w/out relation to the law [Lacan] > tabernacle empty, dissemination fatal

SEC.content: Husserl’s “green is or” still example of agrammaticality: a mark can be cited [is legible?], written, function cut off from “original” meaning > can engender infinitely new contexts
SEC.linkedContent: Husserl’s “green is or” still example of agrammaticality: a mark can be cited [is legible?], written, function cut off from “original” meaning > can engender infinitely new contexts

SEC.content: semantic horizon exceeded or punctured (crevé) by dissemination not polysemia
SEC.linkedContent: semantic horizon exceeded or punctured (crevé) by dissemination not polysemia

EM.content: Heidegger destroys privilege of present-now (Gegenwart) by way of a presence (Anwesen, Anwesenheit) which 3 modes of present (present-present, past-present, future-present) can’t exhaust > provides playing space (l’espace de jeu) on basis of the fourfold (On Time and Being), “an alternative always suspended over its ‘own proper’ abysm”: it is the text of dissemination
EM.linkedContent: Heidegger destroys privilege of present-now (Gegenwart) by way of a presence (Anwesen, Anwesenheit) which 3 modes of present (present-present, past-present, future-present) can’t exhaust > provides playing space (l’espace de jeu) on basis of the fourfold (On Time and Being), “an alternative always suspended over its ‘own proper’ abysm”: it is the text of dissemination

PP.content: Plato prefers one writing over the other, a good writing over bad, a fertile trace (endgenders w/in) over a sterile one (une semence dépensée au-dehors en pure perte, risk of dissemination)
PP.linkedContent: Plato prefers one writing over the other, a good writing over bad, a fertile trace (endgenders w/in) over a sterile one (une semence dépensée au-dehors en pure perte, risk of dissemination)

PP.content: la khōra est grosse de tout ce qui se dissémine ici, inscription produces the son and at the same time the constitution of structurality
PP.linkedContent: la khōra est grosse de tout ce qui se dissémine ici, inscription produces the son and at the same time the constitution of structurality

PAS.content: dissemination does not play w/ the multiple, plural, dispersion, the apart (épars), but with the unique, the unique and itself
PAS.linkedContent: dissemination does not play w/ the multiple, plural, dispersion, the apart (épars), but with the unique, the unique and itself

T.content: tympanum, Dionysianism, Ariadne’s Thread, labyrinth: the bloodiness of a disseminated writing violates embouchure of philosophy, contact w/ another code, a unique event, unreadable as such, inaudible, btwn earth & sea, w/out signature
T.linkedContent: tympanum, Dionysianism, Ariadne’s Thread, labyrinth: the bloodiness of a disseminated writing violates embouchure of philosophy, contact w/ another code, a unique event, unreadable as such, inaudible, btwn earth & sea, w/out signature

T.content: this ecorchè (destroy the tympanum) (Dissemination too was to “skin the ear”), brain dissection, burnt head > pursues deconstruction of triangulocircular structure (Oedipus, Trinity, Speculative Dialectics)
T.linkedContent: this ecorchè (destroy the tympanum) (Dissemination too was to “skin the ear”), brain dissection, burnt head > pursues deconstruction of triangulocircular structure (Oedipus, Trinity, Speculative Dialectics)

WM.content: via Aristotle, univocity (one meaning per noun) is telos (essence) of language, there is only finite polysemia: a nonmasterable dissemination (an irreducible polysemia) is not even a polysemia, it belongs to what is outside language, and thus outside humanity
WM.linkedContent: via Aristotle, univocity (one meaning per noun) is telos (essence) of language, there is only finite polysemia: a nonmasterable dissemination (an irreducible polysemia) is not even a polysemia, it belongs to what is outside language, and thus outside humanity

DS.content: what ruins the “pious capital letter,” the aplomb of the heading: the blanks, ordered return of white spaces, measure & order of dissemination, law of spacing, rhythmos, invisible fleuron
DS.linkedContent: what ruins the “pious capital letter,” the aplomb of the heading: the blanks, ordered return of white spaces, measure & order of dissemination, law of spacing, rhythmos, invisible fleuron

DS.content: out of sight (a perte de vue): hymen & dissemination > une entaille y est marquée, qui ouvre encore sur un autre texte et pratique une autre lecture, l’analyse en serait infinie
DS.linkedContent: out of sight (a perte de vue): hymen & dissemination > une entaille y est marquée, qui ouvre encore sur un autre texte et pratique une autre lecture, l’analyse en serait infinie

DS.content: casting aside (mise à l’écart) of being defines/imprints itself in dissemination, as dissemination
DS.linkedContent: casting aside (mise à l’écart) of being defines/imprints itself in dissemination, as dissemination

DS.content: each “full” white thing in Mallarmé (snow, swan, paper, virginity) is trope of “empty” white space, constellation of “blanks,” there everywhere, reproduced in spacings > la disséminaton des blancs (nous ne dirons pas de la blancheur)
DS.linkedContent: each “full” white thing in Mallarmé (snow, swan, paper, virginity) is trope of “empty” white space, constellation of “blanks,” there everywhere, reproduced in spacings > la disséminaton des blancs (nous ne dirons pas de la blancheur)

DS.content: if no thematic unity, hermeneutic concept of polysemy must be replaced by dissemination
DS.linkedContent: if no thematic unity, hermeneutic concept of polysemy must be replaced by dissemination

DS.content: hymen will have always disseminated: SPERM, burning lava, milk, spume, dribble of seminal liquor
DS.linkedContent: hymen will have always disseminated: SPERM, burning lava, milk, spume, dribble of seminal liquor

DS.content: a bo/lit [TN. abolishing: reading, sleeping]: la dissémination y écume assez le vol d’une semence, perte blanche et vaine où le mât, pour qui le lit, s’abîme en perdition de voile et d’enfant
DS.linkedContent: a bo/lit [TN. abolishing: reading, sleeping]: la dissémination y écume assez le vol d’une semence, perte blanche et vaine où le mât, pour qui le lit, s’abîme en perdition de voile et d’enfant

DS.content: Mallarmé: poets’ nightly emissions ought to be milky ways, not shameful stains
DS.linkedContent: Mallarmé: poets’ nightly emissions ought to be milky ways, not shameful stains

DS.content: quasi-meaning of dissemination, impossible return to rejoined unity or meaning, dissemination affirms always already divided generation of meaning—le laisse d’avance tomber
DS.linkedContent: quasi-meaning of dissemination, impossible return to rejoined unity or meaning, dissemination affirms always already divided generation of meaning—le laisse d’avance tomber

DS.content: neither castration nor dissemination can become originary, central signified, dissem. represents affirmation of this nonorigin, it entails, relaunches, “inscribes” castration
DS.linkedContent: neither castration nor dissemination can become originary, central signified, dissem. represents affirmation of this nonorigin, it entails, relaunches, “inscribes” castration

DS.content: dissemination, fold of hymen, somber white of cave or womb, au noir sur blanc du ventre, lieu de son émission éparse et de ses hasards sans retours [scattered emissions, chances, w/out return]
DS.linkedContent: dissemination, fold of hymen, somber white of cave or womb, au noir sur blanc du ventre, lieu de son émission éparse et de ses hasards sans retours [scattered emissions, chances, w/out return]

DS.content: dissemination in the folds of the hymen

P.content: what is beautiful is dissemination, pure cut w/out negativity; negativity is significant; adherence always connotes division, lack, negativity; beauty is not a signifier; the signifier: accounts for everything except beauty > a non-sterilized cut from fecundation: la semence s’erre
P.linkedContent: what is beautiful is dissemination, pure cut w/out negativity; negativity is significant; adherence always connotes division, lack, negativity; beauty is not a signifier; the signifier: accounts for everything except beauty > a non-sterilized cut from fecundation: la semence s’erre

P.content: glas et galactique du colossos, the bridge [tree?] over the abyss which threatens to swallow everything, interval btwn dynamic/mathematical sublime, on edge of which analytic of sublime is broached (s’entame): whirlpool heaves/tears tree into la dissemence laiteuse (the question is the cipher writing on the surface of nature)
P.linkedContent: glas et galactique du colossos, the bridge [tree?] over the abyss which threatens to swallow everything, interval btwn dynamic/mathematical sublime, on edge of which analytic of sublime is broached (s’entame): whirlpool heaves/tears tree into la dissemence laiteuse (the question is the cipher writing on the surface of nature)

POS.content: dissemination, seminal differance, explodes semantic horizon, not polysemia (which reassembles w/in totalizing, teleological dialectics), play on seme and semen: simulated common parentage, accident produces semantic mirage, deviance of meaning sets something off
POS.linkedContent: dissemination, seminal differance, explodes semantic horizon, not polysemia (which reassembles w/in totalizing, teleological dialectics), play on seme and semen: simulated common parentage, accident produces semantic mirage, deviance of meaning sets something off

POS.content: X as chiasm [btwn philosophy & literature?]: a fork (crossroads, quadrifurcum, grid, trellis, key) > more unequal at one point than other: figure of double gesture, intersection
POS.linkedContent: X as chiasm [btwn philosophy & literature?]: a fork (crossroads, quadrifurcum, grid, trellis, key) > more unequal at one point than other: figure of double gesture, intersection

POS.content: can be hastily thought of as thematic drawing of dissemination [cf. +R p. 166]
POS.linkedContent: can be hastily thought of as thematic drawing of dissemination [cf. +R p. 166]

POS.content: dissemination situates the more or less that resists effect of subjectivity, appropriation > disorganizes, marks writing of Lacan’s “symbolic”: la dissémination figure ce qui ne revient pas au père, affirms endless substitution, does not overlook duplicity, simulacrum [like Lacan’s “symbolic”?]
POS.linkedContent: dissemination situates the more or less that resists effect of subjectivity, appropriation > disorganizes, marks writing of Lacan’s “symbolic”: la dissémination figure ce qui ne revient pas au père, affirms endless substitution, does not overlook duplicity, simulacrum [like Lacan’s “symbolic”?]

POS.content: possibility for a mark to “disembed” itself, “unsew-it,”that which is no longer integrated in “symbolic” > violence & unconscious effects of simulacrum
POS.linkedContent: possibility for a mark to “disembed” itself, “unsew-it,”that which is no longer integrated in “symbolic” > violence & unconscious effects of simulacrum

POS.content: cannot be reclaimed by imaginary, neither veil nor truth, signifier nor signified
POS.linkedContent: cannot be reclaimed by imaginary, neither veil nor truth, signifier nor signified

POS.content: dissemination is play of castration w/out metaphysical/romantic pathos of negativity > dissemination “is” angle of play of castration, the graphic of the hymen
POS.linkedContent: dissemination is play of castration w/out metaphysical/romantic pathos of negativity > dissemination “is” angle of play of castration, the graphic of the hymen

POS.content: dissemination via death drive links new concept of repetition to value of mimesis
POS.linkedContent: dissemination via death drive links new concept of repetition to value of mimesis

ROP.content: la restance disséminale, hyperbolythique, destined (vouée) to chance, to ash, à un oubli radical, trace w/out trace: secret w/out depth, lieu, nom, destination, lysis w/out measure/return/anagogy
ROP.linkedContent: la restance disséminale, hyperbolythique, destined (vouée) to chance, to ash, à un oubli radical, trace w/out trace: secret w/out depth, lieu, nom, destination, lysis w/out measure/return/anagogy

ROP.content: divisibility of letter, truth w/out truth of deconstruction, distinguished both from das geistige Band [Hegel], & Heideggerian Versammlung > divisibility of letter undoes link of debt, symbolic, name of father (motifs qui lien et se lient au triangle ou au cercle de la réappropriation)
ROP.linkedContent: divisibility of letter, truth w/out truth of deconstruction, distinguished both from das geistige Band [Hegel], & Heideggerian Versammlung > divisibility of letter undoes link of debt, symbolic, name of father (motifs qui lien et se lient au triangle ou au cercle de la réappropriation)

ROP.content: Lacan uses trinitarian figures to give firm consistency to a resistance supérieurement organisée > letter always arrives; here proceeds division btwn 3 & 4, btwn resistance bound up in repression & disseminal remaining, no longer belonging to economy of repression
ROP.linkedContent: Lacan uses trinitarian figures to give firm consistency to a resistance supérieurement organisée > letter always arrives; here proceeds division btwn 3 & 4, btwn resistance bound up in repression & disseminal remaining, no longer belonging to economy of repression

O.content: first effect of dissemination: individuality & responsibility no longer predominate
O.linkedContent: first effect of dissemination: individuality & responsibility no longer predominate

O.content: protocol of preface destroys future anterior > a gluing (kollon), praefatio, prae-fari, protokollon as formula, pharmacopoeia, begins (law of dissemination) doubled by a “facing,” divides/undoes inaugural pretention of first page: neither depth, nor surface, in or for itself, un bloc magique

O.content: effect of dissemination: lose one’s head, not know where it is
O.linkedContent: effect of dissemination: lose one’s head, not know where it is

O.content: the 3 is no longer ideality of speculative solution, but the “effect” of a strategic re-mark > referring name of 1 of the 2 terms [in dual opposition] to absolute outside of opposition (marked once again in exposé of differance)
O.linkedContent: the 3 is no longer ideality of speculative solution, but the “effect” of a strategic re-mark > referring name of 1 of the 2 terms [in dual opposition] to absolute outside of opposition (marked once again in exposé of differance)

O.content: [nonsynonymous synonyms] > never enclosed in finite taxonomy > no lexicon as such, can’t be pinned to a point, marks of dissemination, undecidable acc. 2 of binary opposition, not sublatable into 3 of speculative dialectics > displaced along angle of certain re-folding

O.content: dissemination written on back, tain of mirror, not on its inverted specter

O.content: dissemination also explains itself, “the apparatus explains itself,” constitutes itself into a program (heterogeneity, absolute exteriority of seed), but one that is not formalizable, infinity of its code, sa rupture, not saturated w/ self-presence: “it is attached (tient), so to speak, to the incessant falling of a supplement to the code”

TB.content: God’s disseminates the Sem [languages], dissemination is here deconstruction

Gi.content: translation problems not accidental or secondary, thinking of Geschlecht same as translation: French dis- translates (by means of transfer/displacement) German zer- (dissociation, distraction, dissemination, division, dispersion, Zerstreuung, Zerstreutheit, Zerstörung, Zersplitterung, Zerspaltung) [lexical swarm (essaim)]

Gi.linkedContent: inner supplementary frontier splits lexicon again: both dis- and zer- have neutral, nonnegative sense

D.linkedContent: dissemination, germination, no first insemination, “primal” insemination is dissemination: a trace, graft, whose traces have been lost

D.content: “I” as ghost, as germ, term, that disseminates, a germ that carries w/in itself its own term, se faisant fort de sa mort > le sperme: ferme
D.linkedContent: “I” as ghost, as germ, term, that disseminates, a germ that carries w/in itself its own term, se faisant fort de sa mort > le sperme: ferme

D.content: column is nothing, no meaning in itself, a hollow phallus > guarantees innumerable passage of dissemination and playful displacement of margins
D.linkedContent: column is nothing, no meaning in itself, a hollow phallus > guarantees innumerable passage of dissemination and playful displacement of margins

D.content: polysemy multiplies w/in horizon of final parousia, temporary detours of lived passion, a signifying martyrdom of truth past or truth to come [thus, dissemination not polysemy]
D.linkedContent: polysemy multiplies w/in horizon of final parousia, temporary detours of lived passion, a signifying martyrdom of truth past or truth to come [thus, dissemination not polysemy]

D.content: polysemy forgets its horizon is framed: difference btwn discursive polysemy and textual dissemination is difference itself
D.linkedContent: polysemy forgets its horizon is framed: difference btwn discursive polysemy and textual dissemination is difference itself

D.content: seminal dissemination w/out having been or coming back to itself, carried out at at loss, unto death
D.linkedContent: seminal dissemination w/out having been or coming back to itself, carried out at at loss, unto death

D.content: column is not, passage of dissemination, “phallic” significance of column is a semic effect, reflection on 4th surface (described center, represented mastery of dissemination); “is”—procures calm, consciousness of ideal mastery > operation of 4th surface
D.linkedContent: column is not, passage of dissemination, “phallic” significance of column is a semic effect, reflection on 4th surface (described center, represented mastery of dissemination); “is”—procures calm, consciousness of ideal mastery > operation of 4th surface

D.content: column has no being, belongs to no one
D.linkedContent: column has no being, belongs to no one

+R.content: polysemia or even dissemination drags Adami’s sentence far from any shore (rive), preventing any event from ever arriving (s’arriver)
+R.linkedContent: polysemia or even dissemination drags Adami’s sentence far from any shore (rive), preventing any event from ever arriving (s’arriver)

TN.content: Nancy’s partes extra partes, everything outside another outside; p. 14 fold of becoming-inside of the first outside, nothing but surfaces & outsides w/out insides: superficies of surfaces are limits, exposed to a touch that can only leave them intact, untouchable > irreducible disseminal divisibility
TN.linkedContent: Nancy’s partes extra partes, everything outside another outside; p. 14 fold of becoming-inside of the first outside, nothing but surfaces & outsides w/out insides: superficies of surfaces are limits, exposed to a touch that can only leave them intact, untouchable > irreducible disseminal divisibility

TN.content: Nancy links a dissemination of haptics w/ body’s technical character
TN.linkedContent: Nancy links a dissemination of haptics w/ body’s technical character

TN.content: that which can’t be sublated, the dissemination of essence (of the One) > dissemination pluralizes any singularity that allows one to say “the” touch, “the” body
TN.linkedContent: that which can’t be sublated, the dissemination of essence (of the One) > dissemination pluralizes any singularity that allows one to say “the” touch, “the” body

WOG.content: margin btwn polysemy & dissemination, an objection to Heidegger & Aristotle
WOG.linkedContent: margin btwn polysemy & dissemination, an objection to Heidegger & Aristotle

CIN.content: dissemination expresses in “il y a là cendre” what is destined by the fire to dispersion w/out return, pyrificiation of what doesn’t remain, and returns to no one
CIN.linkedContent: dissemination expresses in “il y a là cendre” what is destined by the fire to dispersion w/out return, pyrificiation of what doesn’t remain, and returns to no one

CIN.content: incineration celebrates perhaps the nothing of the all, destruction w/out return, mad w/ its desire, desperate disseminal affirmation but also its opposite: “no” to the work mourning, “no” of fire > how to accept working for his Highness (monseigneur) mourning?
CIN.linkedContent: incineration celebrates perhaps the nothing of the all, destruction w/out return, mad w/ its desire, desperate disseminal affirmation but also its opposite: “no” to the work mourning, “no” of fire > how to accept working for his Highness (monseigneur) mourning?

EU.content: Glas: generalized fetishism, pull of the discourse of castration toward affirmative dissemination [also continues pursuing project of grammatology, etc.]
EU.linkedContent: Glas: generalized fetishism, pull of the discourse of castration toward affirmative dissemination [also continues pursuing project of grammatology, etc.]

SPEC.content: [focusing on Oedipus complex] as if one were pulling this nebulous matrix, w/ disseminations w/out return, by only one of its string (fils), where matricial mother would be only what she is > for what it means to write oedipally, cf. Glas, which concerns itself w/ only strings/sons (fils), with gash (balafre) and demi-deuil in affectations of proper surname
SPEC.linkedContent: [focusing on Oedipus complex] as if one were pulling this nebulous matrix, w/ disseminations w/out return, by only one of its string (fils), where matricial mother would be only what she is > for what it means to write oedipally, cf. Glas, which concerns itself w/ only strings/sons (fils), with gash (balafre) and demi-deuil in affectations of proper surname

FV.content: dissemination threatens law of signifier & castration as contract of truth, dissemination entame unity of signifier, i.e. the phallus
FV.linkedContent: dissemination threatens law of signifier & castration as contract of truth, dissemination entame unity of signifier, i.e. the phallus

FV.content: when letter isn’t allergic to partition, linguistic unit (le sème) “phallus” wanders, begins by disseminating, not even disseminating itself [baby daddy]
